code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant Web Interface
    participant API Gateway
    participant Knowledge Graph Service
    participant Calculation Service
    participant Data Retrieval Service

    Note over User,Data Retrieval Service: ESG Knowledge Graph System - Core Workflow

    User->>Web Interface: Access ESG analysis system
    Web Interface->>API Gateway: Load industries & frameworks
    API Gateway->>Knowledge Graph Service: Query available options (CQ1, CQ2)
    Knowledge Graph Service->>API Gateway: Return industries & categories
    API Gateway->>Web Interface: Display selection options
    Web Interface->>User: Show industry & company selection

    User->>Web Interface: Select industry, company & metrics
    Web Interface->>API Gateway: Request metric calculations
    API Gateway->>Knowledge Graph Service: Determine calculation methods (CQ3, CQ4)
    
    alt Direct Measurement
        Knowledge Graph Service->>Data Retrieval Service: Access external dataset (CQ7)
        Data Retrieval Service->>API Gateway: Return measured values
    else Model Calculation
        Knowledge Graph Service->>Calculation Service: Execute model calculations (CQ5, CQ6)
        Calculation Service->>Data Retrieval Service: Gather required inputs (CQ7)
        Data Retrieval Service->>Calculation Service: Return input values
        Calculation Service->>API Gateway: Return calculated results
    end

    API Gateway->>API Gateway: Store results in memory
    API Gateway->>Web Interface: Return calculation results
    Web Interface->>User: Display ESG metrics & analysis

    User->>Web Interface: Generate comprehensive report
    Web Interface->>API Gateway: Request report generation
    API Gateway->>Knowledge Graph Service: Gather framework context
    API Gateway->>Calculation Service: Compile all metrics
    API Gateway->>Web Interface: Return complete ESG report
    Web Interface->>User: Display final ESG analysis
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
